annotations.normalized_text: Baba Farid University of Health Sciences

text: @nidhiindiatv Baba Farid University of Health Sciences taking exams for BDS courses starting from 7 July and asking student for compulsory Covid-19 test and to sign an undertaking that college shall not be holding any responsibility in any case if any of the students get infected @nidhiindiatv

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
